001
002package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node;
003
004import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathExpression;
005import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IAssemblyDefinition;
006import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IAssemblyInstance;
007import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IAssemblyInstanceGrouped;
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IFieldDefinition;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IFieldInstance;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IFlagDefinition;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IFlagInstance;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModule;
013
014import java.net.URI;
015
016import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
017import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
018
019/**
020 * This factory interface is used to create {@link INodeItem} objects of various
021 * types.
022 * <p>
023 * A singleton instance of this factory can be acquired using the
024 * {@link #instance()} method.
025 */
026public interface INodeItemFactory {
027
028  /**
029   * Get the singleton instance of the default node factory.
030   *
031   * @return the node factory instance
032   */
033  @NonNull
034  static INodeItemFactory instance() {
035    return DefaultNodeItemFactory.instance();
036  }
037
038  /**
039   * Create a new document node item for the provided {@code definition}.
040   *
041   * @param definition
042   *          the root assembly definition to create the document item for.
043   * @param documentUri
044   *          the uniform resource identifier of the document
045   * @param value
046   *          the root item's associated data
047   * @return the new node item
048   */
049  @NonNull
050  IDocumentNodeItem newDocumentNodeItem(
051      @NonNull IAssemblyDefinition definition,
052      @NonNull URI documentUri,
053      @NonNull Object value);
054
055  /**
056   * Create a new Metaschema node item for the provided {@code metaschema}.
057   *
058   * @param module
059   *          the Metaschema to create the item for.
060   * @return the new node item
061   */
062  @NonNull
063  IModuleNodeItem newModuleNodeItem(@NonNull IModule module);
064
065  /**
066   * Create a new {@link IFlagNodeItem}, with no associated value, based on the
067   * provided flag definition.
068   *
069   * @param definition
070   *          the flag definition
071   * @param parent
072   *          the item for the Metaschema containing the definition
073   * @return the new flag node item
074   */
075  @NonNull
076  default IFlagNodeItem newFlagNodeItem(
077      @NonNull IFlagDefinition definition,
078      @NonNull IModuleNodeItem parent) {
079    return new FlagGlobalDefinitionNodeItemImpl(definition, parent);
080  }
081
082  /**
083   * Create a new {@link IFlagNodeItem} based on the provided flag instance.
084   *
085   * @param instance
086   *          the flag instance
087   * @param parent
088   *          the node item containing the flag
089   * @return the new flag node item
090   */
091  @NonNull
092  default IFlagNodeItem newFlagNodeItem(
093      @NonNull IFlagInstance instance,
094      @NonNull IModelNodeItem<?, ?> parent) {
095    return new FlagInstanceNoValueNodeItemImpl(instance, parent);
096  }
097
098  /**
099   * Create a new {@link IFlagNodeItem} based on the provided flag instance.
100   *
101   * @param instance
102   *          the flag instance
103   * @param parent
104   *          the node item containing the flag
105   * @param value
106   *          the item's associated data
107   * @return the new flag node item
108   */
109  @NonNull
110  default IFlagNodeItem newFlagNodeItem(
111      @NonNull IFlagInstance instance,
112      @NonNull IModelNodeItem<?, ?> parent,
113      @NonNull Object value) {
114    return new FlagInstanceNodeItemImpl(instance, parent, value);
115  }
116
117  /**
118   * Create a new {@link IFieldNodeItem} based on the provided definition, which
119   * is expected to be a global definition within the provided Metaschema.
120   *
121   * @param definition
122   *          the global definition
123   * @param metaschema
124   *          the Metaschema containing the definition
125   * @return the new field node item
126   */
127  @NonNull
128  IFieldNodeItem newFieldNodeItem(
129      @NonNull IFieldDefinition definition,
130      @NonNull IModuleNodeItem metaschema);
131
132  /**
133   * Create a new {@link IFieldNodeItem} that is detached from a Metaschema.
134   *
135   * @param definition
136   *          the global definition
137   * @param baseUri
138   *          the base URI to use for this node item when evaluating a
139   *          {@link MetapathExpression}
140   * @return the new field node item
141   */
142  @NonNull
143  IFieldNodeItem newFieldNodeItem(
144      @NonNull IFieldDefinition definition,
145      @Nullable URI baseUri);
146
147  /**
148   * Create a new {@link IFieldNodeItem} that is based on a Metaschema instance.
149   * <p>
150   * A single instance of this item is expected to represent the possibility in a
151   * metaschema of a series of instance values.
152   *
153   * @param instance
154   *          the Metaschema field instance
155   * @param parent
156   *          the parent node item
157   * @return the new field node item
158   */
159  @NonNull
160  IFieldNodeItem newFieldNodeItem(
161      @NonNull IFieldInstance instance,
162      @NonNull IAssemblyNodeItem parent);
163
164  /**
165   * Create a new {@link IFieldNodeItem} that is based on a Metaschema instance
166   * with associated data.
167   *
168   * @param instance
169   *          the Metaschema field instance
170   * @param parent
171   *          the parent node item
172   * @param position
173   *          the data item's position in the sequence of data items for the
174   *          instance
175   * @param value
176   *          the item's associated data
177   * @return the new field node item
178   */
179  @NonNull
180  IFieldNodeItem newFieldNodeItem(
181      @NonNull IFieldInstance instance,
182      @NonNull IAssemblyNodeItem parent,
183      int position,
184      @NonNull Object value);
185
186  /**
187   * Create a new {@link IAssemblyNodeItem} that is detached from a Metaschema.
188   *
189   * @param definition
190   *          the global definition
191   * @return the new assembly node item
192   */
193  @NonNull
194  default IAssemblyNodeItem newAssemblyNodeItem(
195      @NonNull IAssemblyDefinition definition) {
196    return newAssemblyNodeItem(definition, (URI) null);
197  }
198
199  /**
200   * Create a new {@link IAssemblyNodeItem} based on the provided definition,
201   * which is expected to be a global definition within the provided Metaschema.
202   *
203   * @param definition
204   *          the global definition
205   * @param metaschema
206   *          the Metaschema containing the definition
207   * @return the new assembly node item
208   */
209  @NonNull
210  IAssemblyNodeItem newAssemblyNodeItem(
211      @NonNull IAssemblyDefinition definition,
212      @NonNull IModuleNodeItem metaschema);
213
214  /**
215   * Create a new {@link IAssemblyNodeItem} that is detached from a Metaschema.
216   *
217   * @param definition
218   *          the global definition
219   * @param baseUri
220   *          the base URI to use for this node item when evaluating a
221   *          {@link MetapathExpression}
222   * @return the new assembly node item
223   */
224  @NonNull
225  IAssemblyNodeItem newAssemblyNodeItem(
226      @NonNull IAssemblyDefinition definition,
227      @Nullable URI baseUri);
228
229  /**
230   * Create a new {@link IAssemblyNodeItem} that is detached from a Metaschema,
231   * with associated data.
232   *
233   * @param definition
234   *          the global definition
235   * @param baseUri
236   *          the base URI to use for this node item when evaluating a
237   *          {@link MetapathExpression}
238   * @param value
239   *          the associated data
240   * @return the new assembly node item
241   */
242  @NonNull
243  IAssemblyNodeItem newAssemblyNodeItem(
244      @NonNull IAssemblyDefinition definition,
245      @Nullable URI baseUri,
246      @NonNull Object value);
247
248  /**
249   * Create a new {@link IAssemblyNodeItem} that is based on a Metaschema
250   * instance.
251   * <p>
252   * A single instance of this item is expected to represent the possibility in a
253   * metaschema of a series of instance values.
254   *
255   * @param instance
256   *          the Metaschema assembly instance
257   * @param parent
258   *          the parent node item
259   * @return the new assembly node item
260   */
261  @NonNull
262  IAssemblyNodeItem newAssemblyNodeItem(
263      @NonNull IAssemblyInstance instance,
264      @NonNull IAssemblyNodeItem parent);
265
266  /**
267   * Create a new {@link IAssemblyNodeItem} that is based on a Metaschema instance
268   * with associated data.
269   *
270   * @param instance
271   *          the Metaschema assembly instance
272   * @param parent
273   *          the parent node item
274   * @param position
275   *          the data item's position in the sequence of data items for the
276   *          instance, which is {@code 0} based
277   * @param value
278   *          the data item's value
279   * @return the new assembly node item
280   */
281  @NonNull
282  IAssemblyNodeItem newAssemblyNodeItem(
283      @NonNull IAssemblyInstanceGrouped instance,
284      @NonNull IAssemblyNodeItem parent,
285      int position,
286      @NonNull Object value);
287
288  /**
289   * Create a new {@link IAssemblyNodeItem} that is based on a Metaschema instance
290   * with associated data.
291   *
292   * @param instance
293   *          the Metaschema assembly instance
294   * @param parent
295   *          the parent node item
296   * @param position
297   *          the data item's position in the sequence of data items for the
298   *          instance, which is {@code 0} based
299   * @param value
300   *          the data item's value
301   * @return the new assembly node item
302   */
303  @NonNull
304  IAssemblyNodeItem newAssemblyNodeItem(
305      @NonNull IAssemblyInstance instance,
306      @NonNull IAssemblyNodeItem parent,
307      int position,
308      @NonNull Object value);
309}
